metadata.title: CVE-2019-15847 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: The POWER9 backend in GNU Compiler Collection (GCC) before version 10 couldoptimize multiple calls of the __builtin_darn intrinsic into a single call,thus reducing the entropy of the random number generator. This occurredbecause a volatile operation was not specified. For example, within asingle execution of a program, the output of every __builtin_darn() callmay be the same.

criterions.comment: gcc-4.8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
